properties.title: The global parameters of the design file
properties.author: Laurent Jourdren

section.name: Global parameters
section.p: The global section of the design file is composed of 6 parameters (3 are optional):

tr.td: The 1.1 version is currently the only version of the format supported by Teolenn.
The way the first base is numbered.
The length of the oligonucleotide to design
Yes, if omitted oligointervallenght will be set to 0.
The interval of length of oligonucleotides. The lengths of oligonucleotides generated by Teolenn will be oligolenght ± oligointervallenght.
A relative or an absolute path
Yes, can be overrided by the second argument of teolenn.sh
The path to the genome file. All the sequences must be in one file in fasta format.
A or an absolute relative path
Yes, can be overrided by the third argument of teolenn.sh
The path to the masked genome file. All the sequences must be in one file in fasta format.
A relative or an absolute path
Yes, can be overrided by the 4th argument of teolenn.sh. If none value is set in design file or in command line, the value is set to the current directory.
The path to the output directory
